title: Unable to login/login failure
body:
After clicking "Launch," the login window pops up with the new champion and everything. After typing in my username and password and click on "Log In," the login status window pops up and it takes a while logging in. After more than 30 seconds, another pop up box states, 

Connection Error
Connection Failure: Unable to connect to the PVP.net server.
Information regarding what may have caused this error can be found here.
Service availability can be viewed on the League of Legends Server Status webpage.

The link, "here," doesn't work and I cant seem to log in.

replies.body:
The error you're seeing is a general error that occurs when there's a problem with the connection attempt between your network and our game servers.

The best first step would be to run through our [Connection Troubleshooting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) page to see if that helps. 

I'll also track down the issue with the link not working, thanks for the heads up on that!

aye, i thought the same, but apparently it's not a simpple connection between me and the game server. otherwise why would i have no issues on my bpe client. adding on to this, it's been about a full day now. still cannot connect to the server. it's not a connection issue. Not on my end atleast, that much i know.

It really depends on your individual circumstances. I'd say that it is still a connection issue, we just have to figure out _**why**_ there's a connection issue.  The article we have covers the most common reasons we see, though it's not representative of all the scenarios that can happen.

If you're having similar issues to the OP, I'd still recommend going through the steps in the article, but also feel free to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you're still running into issues.
Same problem, no idea how to fix it tried almost everything i can find and think of. Riot was no help either they just directed me to forums that i already tried.

Same for me in the EUNE severs.
On the other hand, I can log in the eu west servers just fine
Did anyone got solution for this error? I am facing the same issue & still not able to login.

i'm having this exact issue. was in the middle of a game, disconnected. wouldn't join in again. so i alt f4'd relaunch was grey, wouldn't work. restart client. this pops up. tried repair and a comp restart. same thing, can't get into league anymore.  would be nice if i could atleast click the link for a hint as to whats goin on
must be an issue with the na server tho. i have no issues connecting and playing games on the pbe
